meanings.definition: To cover or mark with chalk.
meanings.sent1: She bechalks the sidewalk to create hopscotch squares.
meanings.sent2: The teacher bechalks the blackboard with important notes.
meanings.sent3: The artist bechalks the canvas with colorful swirls.
meanings.sent4: The rain bechalks the streets with a temporary white coat.
meanings.sent5: He bechalks the outline of the dinosaur for the school play.

meanings.definition: To write or draw with chalk.
meanings.sent1: The children bechalks their names on the playground wall.
meanings.sent2: She bechalks a beautiful landscape on the pavement.
meanings.sent3: He bechalks a funny face on the classroom door.
meanings.sent4: The artist bechalks intricate patterns on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent5: They bechalks a map of the neighborhood for the scavenger hunt.
